ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Elder Teir Dal is not lizardman, lizard man is a whole different language.......Elder Teir Dal is Koblod, i m on this mithaniel marr server if anyone would
ygData.messageBody:
Elder Teir'Dal is not lizardman, lizard man is a whole different language.......Elder Teir'Dal is Koblod, i'm on this mithaniel marr server if anyone would like to learn elder teir'dal and old erudian to excellent skill lvl, please contact, Xeon.

Xeon

----- Original Message -----
From: J Zenno
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, May 09, 1999 6:15 PM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Languages


In the book On Languages it states on the first page that in the ancient times there was a split and a war between magic users, what was to become the erudites with their wizardry and what was to become the Dark Elves with there Necromancy. It is said that to read the text of these ancient spell casters you must learn Old Erudian for the forefathers of Erudians and Elder Tier Dal for the forefathers of todays Dark Elves. I know that Tier Dal shows up as Dark Elvish when changing languages, I also learned in my travels that Elder Tier Dal shows up a Lizardman. Using my higher inteligence I have concluded that Necromancers would probably find it very usefull to learn Elder Tier Dal as I would find it usefull to learn Old Erudian. Now if anyone knows how I can learn Elder Dragon, the harsh complex language of magic itself please let me know. I would very interested in learning that language or Combine for that matter.
May our paths cross

Zakrul The Traveler
Companion
Wizard
Britstlebane Server
